pokedexEntries.red: Almost incapable of moving, this Pokémon can only harden its shell to protect itself from predators.
pokedexEntries.blue: Almost incapable of moving, this Pokémon can only harden its shell to protect itself from predators.
pokedexEntries.yellow: Able to move only slightly. When endangered, it may stick out its stinger and poison its enemy.
pokedexEntries.gold: Although it is a cocoon, it can move a little. It can extend its poison barb if it is attacked.
pokedexEntries.silver: From this form, it will grow into an adult. As its body becomes softer, the external shell hardens.
pokedexEntries.crystal: Nearly incapable of movement, it leans against stout trees while waiting for its evolution.
pokedexEntries.ruby: Kakuna remains virtually immobile as it clings to a tree. However, on the inside, it is extremely busy as it prepares for its coming evolution. This is evident from how hot the shell becomes to the touch.
pokedexEntries.sapphire: Kakuna remains virtually immobile as it clings to a tree. However, on the inside, it is extremely busy as it prepares for its coming evolution. This is evident from how hot the shell becomes to the touch.
pokedexEntries.emerald: It remains virtually immobile while it clings to a tree. However, on the inside, it busily prepares for evolution. This is evident from how hot its shell becomes.
pokedexEntries.fireRed: This Pokémon is in a temporary stage while making its body. It is almost completely unable to move on its own.
pokedexEntries.leafGreen: Almost incapable of moving, this Pokémon can only harden its shell to protect itself when it is in danger.
pokedexEntries.diamond: While awaiting evolution, it hides from predators under leaves and in nooks of branches.
pokedexEntries.pearl: While awaiting evolution, it hides from predators under leaves and in nooks of branches.
pokedexEntries.platinum: While awaiting evolution, it hides from predators under leaves and in nooks of branches.
pokedexEntries.heartGold: Although it is a cocoon, it can move a little. It can extend its poison barb if it is attacked.
pokedexEntries.soulSilver: From this form, it will grow into an adult. As its body becomes softer, the external shell hardens.
pokedexEntries.black: While awaiting evolution, it hides from predators under leaves and in nooks of branches.
pokedexEntries.white: While awaiting evolution, it hides from predators under leaves and in nooks of branches.
pokedexEntries.black2: While awaiting evolution, it hides from predators under leaves and in nooks of branches.
pokedexEntries.white2: While awaiting evolution, it hides from predators under leaves and in nooks of branches.
pokedexEntries.x: Almost incapable of moving, this Pokémon can only harden its shell to protect itself when it is in danger.
pokedexEntries.y: While awaiting evolution, it hides from predators under leaves and in nooks of branches.
pokedexEntries.omegaRuby: Kakuna remains virtually immobile as it clings to a tree. However, on the inside, it is extremely busy as it prepares for its coming evolution. This is evident from how hot the shell becomes to the touch.
pokedexEntries.alphaSapphire: Kakuna remains virtually immobile as it clings to a tree. However, on the inside, it is extremely busy as it prepares for its coming evolution. This is evident from how hot the shell becomes to the touch.
